SEARCH
Package scs1_group1.container.data

Class AppointmentContainer

Object
RecordContainer
AppointmentContainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Container
public class AppointmentContainer extends RecordContainer
Container class for managing appointment records. Provides functionalities for loading, adding, removing, and exporting appointments.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AppointmentContainer(String appointmentsFilePath)
    Constructs an AppointmentContainer and loads appointments from the given CSV file.

      Retrieves an appointment by its identifier.
      Parameters:
      appointmentIdentifyId - The unique identifier of the appointment.
      Returns:
      The Appointment object if found, otherwise null.

    • addAppointment

      public void addAppointment(String time, String patientHospitalId, String doctorHospitalId)
      Adds a new appointment to the container with given details.
      Parameters:
      time - The time of the appointment.
      patientHospitalId - The hospital ID of the patient.
      doctorHospitalId - The hospital ID of the doctor.

    • getAllAppointmentsByPatientIdAndStatus

      Retrieves all appointments for a specific patient with a given status.

      patientHospitalId - The hospital ID of the patient.
      status - The status of the appointment.
      Returns:
      A list of Appointment objects.

      Returns:
      A list of Appointment objects.

    • removeAppointment

      Removes an appointment from the container by its record ID.

      appointmentRecordId - The unique record ID of the appointment to be removed.
